Package com.toaster.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidIconSizeException
    Exception throws when the size of the specified icon is larger or wider than 40pixels
    TooManyToastException
    Exception throws when there's too many toast in the toaster
    TooShortDurationException
    Exception throws when the Duration of a message is shorter than Parameters.MIN_DURATION
